description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play as a Hopper who is a grasshopper trying to get to the top of a tree.  Jump on the leaves to get higher and watch out for falling apples.
description.short: Play as a Hopper who is a grasshopper trying to get to the top of a tree.  Jump on the leaves to get higher and watch out for falling apples.
